author: Ayebabara
content: If you want to get bitcoin price alert in you mobile phone or smartwatch, then you can install the price alert notification app and set the price either downtime or when increasing. This has been my mind for sometimes to receive notification when the price of bitcoin goes down and going up. So I decided to make a research on such website or app and I found out this one is reliable. cryptocurrency Alerting,  Click here for more and you can also select others for your choice.How Does It Work?First download the app from Google play and install it and sign up with your working email address and password After when you have login then the home page with get started.And you click on the get started. Click add AlertThen the followingThen you have to click on the Market (The Exchange you want to receive the notification/alert) and the currency you want to receive the alert/ notification and tick on the price trigger either one or the two.And the following will appearAnd wait for the alert to notify you but all depends on the area you out the price either when the price is coming down or when the price is going up but I did mine for rising up to $30,200 and I got the notification yesterday evening. See the notification that I got.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Trading, seriously said, will cause loss for most traders. The Price Alert Notifications will bring more real time price pings that will cause more pressure and you know, pressure is not good for your trading.The more price alerts you get, the more pressure you will have and very possibly, more losses you will make from your tradings. It is worse because most of people who use price alerts are amateur, not professional traders so price alert effects will be more negatively.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Getting bitcoin price alert isn't the key to  success in trading and the alerts wouldn't make profit for you. Trading needs skills and how you can come up with your own strategy on making profit. Sometimes this alert can lead you to great loss because you will be unstable in your thoughts which is harmful to your trading. I am not saying that it is bad to have an alert notifier on bitcoin price but it is when you don't have any idea on trading because you will run at loss. A bitcoin hodler can use this alerts to know when to increase his DCA amount and when he will reduce it.

comments.body: Quote from: Ayebabara on November 14, 2023, 10:37:05 PMThis helped me these days when bitcoin was going up because I set it to get information. You're informed that the price has reached a certain point, you proceed to TradingView to confirm it, and yes it's correct, and then? You get back to whatever you're doing? I don't know with others here but I've long stopped alerting myself of the prices. I used to when I tried trading. I stopped years ago with a little disappointment, and so now I already find price alerts of little use. I've now been hodling and I don't care much if I'm not informed of the price for weeks.

comments.author: bayu7adi
comments.body: Notification apps like these used to be very helpful for me when I was trying to be a day trader... unfortunately, i didn't use this app.. i used Tab Trader instead. However, after multiple failures and losses, I decided to focus solely on the long term. It seems like my mind as a day trader is too bad... so, i don't need this app anymore till i get my long term profit.I'm sure many people still use this app just to monitor prices. It's strange if their emotions get disrupted by receiving such price information. isn't a trader's strategy planned from the start?.. so, dealing with volatile prices shouldn't affect professional traders. The key is to use the app according to the trading needs they have.
